roleset.name: establish a balance

example.name: simple transitive
example.text: And even those who say some selective selling may be in order stress that individuals need to be in the stock market to achieve their long - term investment objectives and to help balance their other assets .

example.name: ergative
example.text: To make the books balance , as is required by law , somebody invented a new budget line item that simply subtracted $ 45 billion .

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Of these three , US income from selling technology is four times the amount it spends buying technology elsewhere , and it earns enough each year in patent royalties to balance its enormous deficit in manufactured goods .

propbank.arg: its enormous deficit in manufactured goods

example.name: passive with comparator
example.text: 2 . In seeking approval of a TRO , the prosecutor must articulate any anticipated impact that forfeiture and the TRO would have on innocent third parties , balanced against the government 's need to preserve the assets .

propbank.arg: any anticipated impact that forfeiture and the TRO would have on innocent third parties
against the government 's need to preserve the assets

example.name: ARG0
example.text: Within the alliance it is supposed to act as a balancing force , guarding against excessive control by government or abuse of its economic position by business , for either could result in a deterioration of its living standards -LRB- under the new resolutions , workers councils may demand that a cooperative be closed or its prices be reduced -RRB- .

roleset.note: BALANCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'balance' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 47.6, 45.4. (from balance.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: balance completely over time

role.descr: arg1 balances out with what? Point of comparison when separate mention

example.name: Arg's 0 & 1 only
example.text: Fortunately , people 's luck always tends to balance out .

roleset.note: BALANCE_OUT-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from balance.02-v)
